title: Low priority cue for lagging out
body: Me and my misses "chanelley" were playing a game at my house, didnt realise the internet was capped. Im now under low priorty and have to wait "20" minutes to play a game, my misses didnt get low priority just me.. Please undo it. thankyou

replies.body:
The leaver buster system is designed so that you won't get put in a low priority queue if you have occasional issues like this.   It will put you in a queue if you consistently disconnect or go afk in games, and it sounds like this is what happened to you.

Even if the issue was accidental, you must have been close to the line already, and this is what put you over.

Mindstar
